overview:
Khalil Malik is a Leader and versatile IT Professional with extensive experience effecting enterprise profitability and performance through alignment of IT with corporate goals. Proven ability to motivate IT resources to meet tactical and strategic business needs. Creative thinker, with an analytical approach to situations and the demonstrated ability to recognize opportunities for improvement and to champion new directions. Skilled communicator possessing the patience and ability to present highly complex material to individuals of widely varying technical and educational backgrounds in simple terms.

Specialties:

• Leadership • Software Development Life Cycle • Information Technology • AGILE (SCRUM) Development • IT Compliance • Project Management • Quality Assurance • Resource Management • Performance Counseling • Contract Negotiations • Buy vs. Build Analysis • Vendor Management • Technology Investments Justification • Technical Communication Facilitation • Budget Management, Proposal to Completion
